subScenes.name: 打招呼咨询
subScenes.description: 向管理员礼貌询问借书流程

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! Can you help me with borrowing books?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！你能帮我一下借书的事吗？

responses.text: Sure! I'd love to help. What do you need to know?
responses.text_cn: 当然！我很乐意帮忙。你想知道什么？

responses.text: Yeah, sure. Just ask.
responses.text_cn: 行啊，问吧。

responses.text: Of course. How can I assist you?
responses.text_cn: 当然可以，有什么可以帮您的？

qaPairs.usageNote: 用礼貌用语开启对话，别直接问问题

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm new here. How many books can I borrow?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我是新手，我能借几本书？

responses.text: You can borrow up to 5 books at a time.
responses.text_cn: 一次最多能借5本。

responses.text: Five, no more!
responses.text_cn: 五本，别超！

responses.text: The limit is five. You can renew them later.
responses.text_cn: 上限五本，之后还能续借。

qaPairs.usageNote: 回答要包含数量+可续借信息，更实用

subScenes.name: 确认借期
subScenes.description: 了解借书期限和逾期后果

qaPairs.speakerText: How long can I keep the books?

responses.text: You've got 2 weeks. After that, you'll get fined.
responses.text_cn: 两周，超期要罚款。

responses.text: Two weeks. Don't be late!
responses.text_cn: 两周，别迟到！

responses.text: The standard loan period is 14 days. Late returns cost $1 per day.
responses.text_cn: 标准借期14天，每天罚1美元。

qaPairs.usageNote: 回答需包含期限+罚款，避免用户误判

qaPairs.speakerText: What if I can't return them on time?

responses.text: You can renew them online if no one's waiting.
responses.text_cn: 没人预约就能在线续借。

responses.text: Just renew it if you can.
responses.text_cn: 能续就续吧。

responses.text: Renewal is allowed once, unless someone else requested it.
responses.text_cn: 可续一次，除非别人预约了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 强调续借条件，避免用户误以为能无限续

subScenes.name: 办理续借
subScenes.description: 询问并确认续借操作方式

qaPairs.speakerText: Can I renew my books online?

responses.text: Yep! Just log in to your account and click 'Renew'.
responses.text_cn: 能！登录账户点‘续借’就行。

responses.text: Sure, easy. Go to the website.
responses.text_cn: 当然，去网站操作。

responses.text: Yes, through our library portal. Only if no holds are placed.
responses.text_cn: 可以，通过图书馆系统，但没人预约才行。

qaPairs.usageNote: 回答要包含具体操作步骤，方便用户执行

qaPairs.speakerText: What if the system says 'Cannot renew'?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果系统显示‘无法续借’怎么办？

responses.text: Someone else requested it. You gotta return it.
responses.text_cn: 有人预约了，得还回去。

responses.text: Oh no! Return it or pay a fine.
responses.text_cn: 糟了，要么还书要么交罚款。

responses.text: It means another patron has placed a hold. You'll need to return the book by the due date.
responses.text_cn: 说明有人预约了，必须按时归还。

qaPairs.usageNote: 解释‘无法续借’的真实原因，避免误解

subScenes.name: 道别结束
subScenes.description: 礼貌道别并确认信息无误

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much! So, 5 books, 2 weeks, can renew online?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太感谢了！就是5本、两周、能在线续借，对吧？

responses.text: Exactly! Have a great day reading!
responses.text_cn: 没错！祝你阅读愉快！

responses.text: Yep, that's right. Enjoy!
responses.text_cn: 对，没错，好好看！

responses.text: Correct. Don't forget to log in to renew before the due date.
responses.text_cn: 对，别忘了到期前登录续借。

qaPairs.usageNote: 复述关键点可避免误解，提升沟通效率

responses.text: See you then! Bring your library card!
responses.text_cn: 到时候见！记得带借书卡！

responses.text: Cool, bye!
responses.text_cn: 好，拜！

responses.text: Looking forward to it. Have a wonderful day!
responses.text_cn: 期待再见，祝你今天愉快！

qaPairs.usageNote: 道别时可加提示，强化关键信息记忆
